data.title: Dave Kehr's Top Ten Lists 1974
data.text:
2006

(davekehr.com) Bubble (Steven Soderbergh)

L'Enfant (Jean-Pierre & Luc Dardenne)

The Fountain (Darren Aronofsky)

Letters From Iwo Jima (Clint Eastwood)

Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World (Albert Brooks)

Manderlay (Lars von Trier)

Monster House (Gil Kenan)

Le Petit Lieutenant (Xavier Beauvois)

Thank You For Smoking (Jason Reitman)

1974

(Chicago Reader) 01. Le Petit Theatre de Jean Renoir (Jean Renoir)

02. Fear Eats the Soul (Rainer Werner Fassbinder)

Best Films of the 1980s
